siteMetadata.name: Liza Katz
siteMetadata.title: Liza Katz (lizozom) | AI Engineer & GenAI Consultant | Make AI Make Sense
siteMetadata.description: Liza Katz (also known as lizozom) - Helping teams and audiences make AI make sense through public speaking, workshops and hands-on Big Data & GenAI consulting.
siteMetadata.about:
Seasoned software engineer and team lead specializing in GenAI, search, and scalable systems. I build RAG applications, AI agents, and hybrid search solutions using Python, TypeScript, Next.js, and modern frameworks.

As a consultant, I've delivered end-to-end GenAI projects for clients across industries. My background spans ad-tech, finance, and big data with deep expertise in Elasticsearch, OpenSearch, and LLM-powered applications.

Recent wins: Webby Award for "Human or Not" and Google AI Hackathon winner for "Tube Uni."

Available for GenAI consulting, partnerships, public speaking, and private workshops.

markdownRemark.excerpt: I’m excited to share that I’ve earned the AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer – Associate certification! The AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer…
markdownRemark.html:
I’m excited to share that I’ve earned the AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer – Associate certification!

The AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer – Associate validates expertise in designing, implementing, deploying, and maintaining machine learning solutions on AWS. This certification demonstrates proficiency in ML engineering practices, including data preparation, model development, deployment automation, and monitoring ML systems in production environments.

You can learn more about this certification on the official AWS page.

frontmatter.title: Certification: AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer – Associate
frontmatter.description: Achieved AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer – Associate certification, validating expertise in designing, implementing, and maintaining ML solutions on AWS.
